entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as sitting next to Harry and Hermione in the Gryffindor common room. He is also mentioned as saying 'Rather you than me' when Harry decides to ask Snape for Quidditch through the Ages.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as sitting next to Harry and Ron in the Gryffindor common room. She is also mentioned as checking their Charms homework and saying 'How will you learn?'

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as feeling restless and wanting Quidditch through the Ages to take his mind off his nerves. He is also mentioned as going down to the staff room to ask Snape for the book.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as being a teacher and having Quidditch through the Ages in his possession. Harry decides to go down to the staff room to ask him for the book.

relationships.description: Harry goes down to the staff room to ask Snape if he can have Quidditch through the Ages.
Ron says 'Rather you than me' when Harry decides to go down to the staff room to ask Snape for the book.
